trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
Represents the method that will handle the *MethodName*<see langword="Completed" /> event of an asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 表示将处理异步操作的 MethodName<see langword="Completed" /> 事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: When you create an <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventHandler> delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 创建 <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventHandler> 委托时，需要标识将要处理该事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。

trans-unit.source: The event-handler method is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非移除了该委托，称为每当发生该事件时，事件处理程序方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 事件和委托](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115)。

trans-unit.source: For an asynchronous method, called *MethodName*, in your component, you will have a corresponding *MethodName*`Completed` event, and an optional *MethodName*`CompletedEventArgs` class.
trans-unit.target: 调用的异步方法*MethodName*，在组件中，你将具有相应*MethodName* `Completed`事件和一个可选*MethodName*`CompletedEventArgs`类。

trans-unit.source: For a component that supports multiple concurrent invocations of its asynchronous methods, the client can supply a unique token, or task ID, to distinguish which asynchronous task is raising particular events.
trans-unit.target: 对于支持其异步方法的多个并发调用的组件，客户端可以提供一个唯一令牌，或任务 ID，以区分的异步任务引发特定事件。

trans-unit.source: The client's <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventHandler> can read the <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.UserState%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to determine which task is reporting completion.
trans-unit.target: 客户端的<xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventHandler>可以读取<xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.UserState%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性来确定哪些任务报告已完成。

trans-unit.source: Your implementation should use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager?displayProperty=nameWithType> to create an <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperation?displayProperty=nameWithType> that associates the client's task IDs with pending asynchronous tasks.
trans-unit.target: 您的实现应使用<xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperationManager?displayProperty=nameWithType>创建<xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncOperation?displayProperty=nameWithType>，它将关联的客户端的任务 Id 和挂起的异步任务。

trans-unit.source: For a code example of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventHandler> delegate, see the example in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs?displayProperty=nameWithType> class.
trans-unit.target: 有关代码示例的<xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventHandler>委托，请参阅中的示例<xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs?displayProperty=nameWithType>类。
